short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the LinkedIn public feed but allows viewing posts on individual profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your LinkedIn experience today—stay focused with LinkedIn Feed Hider!

LinkedIn Feed Hider is the perfect solution for users who want to stay focused and avoid unnecessary distractions while using LinkedIn. With this extension, the main public feed is hidden when you visit LinkedIn, allowing you to maintain productivity by eliminating the clutter of posts and updates.

You can still view posts and content from individual profiles when you explicitly visit them—giving you control over what you see on LinkedIn.

Key Features:

- Hides the public feed on LinkedIn to minimize distractions.
- Allows you to view posts on individual profiles as usual.
- Helps maintain productivity by reducing information overload.


How It Works: When you visit the LinkedIn home feed, the extension automatically hides the feed, replacing it with a simple message. You can still navigate to other parts of LinkedIn and view individual profiles, giving you the flexibility to connect without unnecessary distractions.
